name: CNN
text: More people die from air pollution than gun violence. And communities of color are disproportionately affected by both. @DonLemon talks to environmental justice advocate @EJinAction about how BIPOC experience environmental racism. #SilenceIsNotAnOption https://t.co/7wcPHrHVlO https://t.co/dW1rLu9m9a

name: CNN
text:
Greenland's ice sheet lost an annual record of 532 billion tons of ice in 2019, with 223 billion tons of ice lost in July alone, a new study finds.

In comparison, between 2003 and 2016, the ice sheet lost about 255 billion tons of ice per year on average. https://t.co/a0ImtXIieH

name: CNN
text: Joe Biden is set to give the most important speech of his 50 years in politics, hoping to convince frustrated voters that he would be a more caring, competent and thoughtful president than Donald Trump. #DemConvention https://t.co/2G1fYtzEK6

name: CNN
text: Fires burning across California and Colorado are pumping out smoke that would be bad enough on its own, but might also worsen coronavirus symptoms, doctors are warning https://t.co/5YKk3WxHU3

name: CNN
text:

name: CNN
text: When former Trump adviser Steve Bannon was arrested, he was taken into custody by federal officials with the help of USPS' crime prevention force, a key arm of the agency that's provided investigative and security support since before America's founding https://t.co/j7EJD3tGId

name: CNN
text: Joe Biden is not Donald Trump. That might be enough for a whole lot of Americans. But the bruising primary Biden won pitted moderates vs. progressives on the role of government in making lives better — differences that still exist | Analysis by @zbyronwolf https://t.co/7rQhGNBof0

name: CNN
text:

name: CNN
text: As foreign ambassadors to the US sit at home watching the Democratic National Convention from their couches, they are upset about what they are missing: a prime opportunity to schmooze with the officials who could be part of an incoming administration https://t.co/LUvRN6Eot1
